Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Increases your chance to critically hit with all of your primary powers against players and minions by 2% and boosts your chance to critically hit by 4% against most other enemies and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Scrappers and may be slotted into any Scrapper damage power.

Powers.DescShort: Increases Attack Rate, Critical Hit Chance Increase
